tool_description: This API helps to query rooms, price, facilities, policities, etc information from many hotels around the world to create a travel site such as : booking.com
name: Booking
title: Booking

api_list.name: properties/list-by-map (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List properties by coordinate of bounding box

required_parameters.name: bbox
required_parameters.description: Coordinate of bounding box - latitude (bottom left),latitude (top right),longitude (bottom left),longitude (top right)

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The check-out date, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-15

required_parameters.name: arrival_date
required_parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-14

required_parameters.name: room_qty
required_parameters.description: The number of rooms

required_parameters.name: guest_qty
required_parameters.description: The number of adults

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The offset to ignore for paging purpose. The number of items per response is always fixed at 20,

optional_parameters.name: price_filter_currencycode
optional_parameters.description: The base currency to calculate exchange rate

optional_parameters.name: categories_filter
optional_parameters.description: The id returned by .../filters/list API, values separated by comma

optional_parameters.name: search_id
optional_parameters.description: (Deprecated) Pass \\\"none\\\" or value returned right in this API

optional_parameters.name: children_age
optional_parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma

api_list.name: properties/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List properties having type of resorts, hotels, motels, hostels, etc as on official site

required_parameters.name: arrival_date
required_parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-14

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The check-out date, the format is yyyy-MM-dd. Ex : 2022-08-15

required_parameters.name: dest_ids
required_parameters.description: Value of dest_id or city_ufi field from locations/auto-complete API (Don't pass this if you use latlong as search_type)

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: The offset to ignore for paging purpose. The number of items per response is always fixed at 20.

required_parameters.name: room_qty
required_parameters.description: The number of rooms

required_parameters.name: guest_qty
required_parameters.description: The number of adults

required_parameters.name: search_type
required_parameters.description: Value of dest_type returned by locations/auto-complete API

optional_parameters.name: price_filter_currencycode
optional_parameters.description: The base currency to calculate exchange rate

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: 10.838039 - Don't pass this param if you DON'T use latlong as search_type

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: 106.686102 - Don't pass this param if you DON'T use latlong as search_type

optional_parameters.name: categories_filter
optional_parameters.description: The id returned by .../filters/list API, separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : price::9-40,free_cancellation::1,class::1,class::0,class::2

optional_parameters.name: children_age
optional_parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma

optional_parameters.name: search_id
optional_parameters.description: (Deprecated) Pass 'none' or value returned right in this API. You need to pass this parameter to get 'offset' working

api_list.name: properties/get-rooms (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get full details of rooms in the hotel

required_parameters.name: search_id
required_parameters.description: The value returned in properties/list API having response contains the selected hotel

required_parameters.name: arrival_date
required_parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel

required_parameters.name: rec_guest_qty
required_parameters.description: The number of adults separated by comma, and how you arrange them in rooms

required_parameters.name: hotel_id
required_parameters.description: The value of hotel_id field from properties/list API

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The check-out date

optional_parameters.name: rec_children_age
optional_parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma

optional_parameters.name: recommend_for
optional_parameters.description: The recommended number of persons per room

optional_parameters.name: rec_children_qty
optional_parameters.description: The number of children separated by comma, and how you arrange them in rooms

api_list.name: properties/get-facilities
api_list.description: Get facilities of property by id

required_parameters.name: hotel_ids
required_parameters.description: The value of hotel_id field from properties/list API

api_list.name: review-filters/list
api_list.description: List supported options metadata for filtering reviews

required_parameters.name: hotel_id
required_parameters.description: The value of hotel_id field from properties/list API

optional_parameters.name: filter_language
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings (separated by comma for multiple values): en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

optional_parameters.name: filter_customer_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings (separated by comma for multiple values) : couple|family_with_children|review_category_group_of_friends|solo_traveller

api_list.name: filters/list
api_list.description: A list of filter options to pass in categories_filter field. Pass params and values are as same as .../properties/list API

required_parameters.description: The number of rooms

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The check-out date

required_parameters.name: dest_ids

required_parameters.description: The number of adults

optional_parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: 106.686102 - Don't pass this param if you DON'T use latlong as search_type

optional_parameters.name: price_filter_currencycode
optional_parameters.description: The base currency to calculate exchange rate

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: 10.838039 - Don't pass this param if you DON'T use latlong as search_type

api_list.name: reviews/list

required_parameters.name: hotel_ids
required_parameters.description: The value of hotel_id field from properties/list API

optional_parameters.name: rows
optional_parameters.description: The number of items per page

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of items to ignore as offset for paging

optional_parameters.name: filter_language
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings (separated by comma for multiple values): en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

optional_parameters.name: filter_customer_type
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings (separated by comma for multiple values) : couple|family_with_children|review_category_group_of_friends|solo_traveller

api_list.name: properties/detail
api_list.description: Get brief information of a property

required_parameters.name: rec_room_qty
required_parameters.description: The number of rooms

required_parameters.name: search_id
required_parameters.description: The value returned in properties/list API having response contains the selected hotel

required_parameters.name: departure_date
required_parameters.description: The check-out date

required_parameters.name: hotel_id
required_parameters.description: The value of hotel_id field from properties/list API

required_parameters.name: rec_guest_qty
required_parameters.description: The number of adults separated by comma, and how you arrange them in rooms

required_parameters.name: arrival_date
required_parameters.description: The check-in date at hotel

optional_parameters.name: block_ids
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'block_ids' field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: dest_ids
optional_parameters.description: The value of 'dest_id' field returned in .../locations/auto-complete endpoint

optional_parameters.name: rec_children_qty
optional_parameters.description: The number of children separated by comma, and how you arrange them in rooms

optional_parameters.name: recommend_for
optional_parameters.description: The recommended number of persons per room

optional_parameters.name: rec_children_age
optional_parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma. Ex : 5,7

optional_parameters.description: The value of 'block_ids' field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: rec_children_age
optional_parameters.description: The year old of each child that separated by comma. Ex : 5,12

api_list.description: Get policies of property by id

api_list.name: properties/get-static-map
api_list.description: Get static map at specific GEO location

required_parameters.name: width
required_parameters.description: The width of image in pixel

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: The latitude co-ordinate

required_parameters.name: zoom
required_parameters.description: Zoom in/out of map

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of image in pixel

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: The latitude co-ordinate

api_list.name: currency/get-exchange-rates
api_list.description: Get currency exchange rates between different countries

required_parameters.name: base_currency
required_parameters.description: One of the followings : en|en-us|ar|bg|ca|cs|da|de|el|es|es-ar|et|fi|fr|he|hr|hu|id|is|it|ja|ko|lt|lv|ms|nl|no|pl|pt|pt-br|ro|ru|sk|sl|sr|sv|th|tl|tr|uk|vi|zh|zh-tw

optional_parameters.name: languagecode
optional_parameters.description: The language code of specific country

api_list.name: locations/auto-complete
api_list.description: List suggested locations by countries, cities, districts, places name

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Name of cities, districts, places
